title: Champions League Top Scorers: Mbapp√© Takes the Lead
text:
CHAMPIONS LEAGUE 2025/26
Champions League Top Scorers: Mbapp√© reaches 9 goals
Published New:27/11/2025 - 00:21h
Updated New:27/11/2025 - 00:21h
The UEFA Champions League top scorers' standings now have Kylian Mbapp√© as the leader. The Frenchman has scored 9 goals with Real Madrid
Kylian Mbapp√© took sole lead of the top scorers' standings in the UEFA Champions League 2025/26. The Real Madrid '10' scored a 'poker' against Olympiacos (3-4) to give his team victory and reach 9 goals in the league phase, surpassing Victor Osimhen (6).
The Nigerian missed Galatasaray's clash against Union Saint-Gilloise (0-1), where the Turks were surprised at home. The top of the Pichichi table is completed by Erling Haaland (Man. City) and Harry Kane (Bayern). Neither could score in matchday 5 and they remain in third place with 5 goals.
The Norwegian was a substitute in the 'sky blue' team's defeat against Bayer Leverkusen (0-2), while the Bavarian '9' played the full 90 minutes in Bayern's defeat against Arsenal (3-1). Another six players remain tied with 4 goals, including Vitinha. The Portuguese player scored a hat-trick in PSG's thrashing of Tottenham (5-3).

Mbapp√© pulls away in the Pichichi race on matchday 5
Mbapp√©'s 4 goals were his first 'poker' in the Champions League. The Frenchman scored a 'hat-trick' in the first half between the 22nd and 29th minute, taking advantage of Olympiacos' defensive errors and assists from Vinicius, Arda G√ºler, and Camavinga. In the second half, Vini set him up again to round off the scoring.
For Bar√ßa, and remain as top scorers with 4 and 3 goals, respectively. The player from Huelva started against Chelsea and the Englishman played the second half, unable to prevent the harsh defeat for the Blaugrana at Stamford Bridge. Juli√°n √Ålvarez and former Culer Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang also have 3 goals after finding the net in matchday 5.
